introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.content: We collect the following types of data: personal identification information (name (username), email address, etc.).

data_usage.title: Data Usage
data_usage.content: We use your data for the following purposes: to provide and maintain our service, to notify you about changes to our service, to allow you to participate in interactive features of our service, to provide customer support, to gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our service.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: We do not share your data with anyone, your data is fully secure.

user_rights.title: User Rights
user_rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your data: the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you, the right to rectification, the right to object, the right of restriction, the right to data portability, and the right to withdraw consent, most of these can be done under your settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, please contact us at:

introduction.title: Acceptance of Terms
introduction.content: By accessing or using the Map Journey app, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you may not use the app.

description.title: Description of the Service
description.content: Map Journey allows users to create and manage trip maps by placing pins with location data, text, and images. Pins can be set as public or private, and users can create customizable profiles with images and banners.

user_accounts.title: User Accounts
user_accounts.content: To access certain features of the app, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration and to update your information as necessary. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.

user_generated_content.title: User-Generated Content
user_generated_content.content: Users can create and upload content, including pins and profile details. You retain ownership of your content but grant Map Journey a non-exclusive, worldwide license to host, display, and distribute it within the app. You are responsible for ensuring your content does not violate any laws or rights of others.

prohibited_conduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited_conduct.content: You agree not to: (1) post illegal or harmful content, (2) harass, threaten, or impersonate others, (3) attempt to hack or reverse-engineer the app, (4) share false or misleading information, or (5) infringe on the rights of others.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content: Your use of the app is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. By using the app, you agree to the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All non-user-generated content, including the app’s design, software, and logos, is the property of Map Journey or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of the app without prior written consent.

service_availability.title: Service Availability and Modifications
service_availability.content: We strive to maintain the app’s availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue features or the entire service without prior notice.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time if you violate these Terms. You may also delete your account at any time. Termination will result in the deletion of your content and data.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: The app is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy of content or location data and are not responsible for user interactions or external links.

limitation_of_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Map Journey shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the app.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms are governed by applicable international laws and standards. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the app will be resolved in accordance with global legal principles and under the jurisdiction of internationally recognized legal bodies.

updates_to_terms.title: Changes to These Terms
updates_to_terms.content: We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes through in-app notifications or email. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at:
